Firearms

Rifles

10/22 Rifle .22 speedload (.22 LR Magazine) 2 0 - 3.2(8)* 3* Shot 4-12* 25% 2.3*
W-U M18 Rifle 6mm magazine (.25 ACP Magazine)* 2 6 - 3.2(10)* 2 Shot 5-15* 15% 3.2 I can't think of a redesign for this so it can go.
FN SCAR-L Rifle (AR-15 Rifle)* 5.56mm magazine* 2 6* - 3.5(16)* 2* Shot 16-30* 20% 3.0* A modern semi-automatic rifle developed for the pre-collapse American market and finished in matte black. The polymer pistol grip and handguards sport some superficial battle scratches but the firearm itself appears fully functional. It features an adjustable buttstock and picatinny rail on top of the receiver for mounting optics.
(M4A1 Rifle)* 5.56mm magazine* 2 8* - 3.3(16) 0* Shot 15-30 20% 2.9* A full auto variant of the standard AR-15 rifle intended for military use. The barrel has been shortened to about 14 inches and the polymer handguard has been replaced with a black aluminum picatinny quad rail, providing ample room for tactical accessories.
FN FAL Rifle (SKS Rifle)* (7.62mm Soviet magazine)* 2 5* - 4.0(16)* 0* Shot 18-36* 20% 3.9* (Single only) A cold war era semi-automatic rifle with a vintage wooden shoulder stock. The magwell appears to be fitted to take 7.62mm Soviet magazines. It features a permanently attached folding bayonet at the end of the muzzle.
Rusty AK-7 Rifle (Rusty AKM Rifle)* (7.62mm Soviet magazine)* 2 5* - 4.0(19)* -8* Shot 17-36* 20% 3.3*
AK-7 Rifle (AKM Rifle)* (7.62mm Soviet magazine)* 2 8* - 3.6(19)* -2* Shot 17-36* 20% 3.3*
AR-17 Rifle (RPK Light Machine Gun)* (7.62mm Soviet drum magazine)* 2 11* - 3.3(21)* -6* Shot 18-36* 20% 5.1* (Full auto only) An AKM that has been modified into a light machinegun configuration. A thicker, longer barrel and receiver along with more robust internal mechanics have been designed to reduce overheating problems and improve automatic fire capabilities. A bipod is installed on the end of the barrel and the stock has also been redesigned for better comfort aiming in the prone position.
QBZ-97 Rifle (FAL Rifle)* 5.8mm magazine (7.62mm NATO magazine)* 2 10* - 4.2(21)* -3* Shot 23-38* 15% 4.3 (Insert FAL's description here)
QBZ-95 Rifle (SCAR-H Marksman Rifle) 5.8mm magazine (7.62mm NATO magazine)* 2 10* - 4.4(21)* 0* Shot 23-38* 15% 3.2 (Insert SCAR-L's description here)
Sniper Rifle (BFG-50 Anti-materiel Rifle) sniper round (Suspicious .50 BMG Round) 2 13* - 4.8(27)* 0 Shot 32-55* 50% 12.0* A full-metal bolt-action rifle with a monstrously thick and heavy barrel coming in at an intimidating 5 feet in total length. The firearm features a pistol grip and a simple cylindrical receiver which partially sheathes the barrel and acts as the buttstock while housing the massive bolt assembly. The absence of a mag well suggests that bullets are fed through the large side-ejection port one at a time. There are no iron sights present but a short length of raised picatinny rail has been welded to the top for mounting optics.

12mm Hammerhead Pistol (Desert Eagle Pistol)* 12mm magazine (.50 AE Magazine)* 1 8* - 3.8(20)* -3* Shot 10-38* 35% 1.8* A hefty magnum caliber semi-automatic handgun with a polished chrome finish worthy of any Hollywood feature film. Picatinny rails are machined directly into the top of the barrel assembly and lower frame. The words “Desert Eagle Pistol” and “Made in the USA” are laser etched into one side.
Viper 12mm pistol (AMT Automag V Pistol)* 12mm magazine (.50 AE Magazine)* 1 8* - 3.7(20)* -4* Shot 10-38* 35% 1.3 A single action semi-automatic magnum handgun made of cast stainless steel and finished in dark grey. Its light weight and nimble handling betrays the unusually large size and ten inch length. It has built-in compensator ports machined into the barrel to assist in keeping muzzle rise to tolerable levels. A number of different company names have been etched into the frame on slide along with a noticeably low serial number.

Spears

Man, ain't no-one gonna endure getting the pointy end of a stick jabbed at them without some decent reflexes!

Fists

Busting someone up in a bar fight is a matter of having the brawn to deliver the hits, and the endurance to take them.

Weapon Name Handed Min. Raw PC Base Spd. Accuracy Bonus Damage/Brawn Damage/Skill Damage Type Damage Range Crit Rate Weight (Dodge penalty) Comments
Fists 2 0 0 1 Beat 1-3 20% Everyone starts with a pair of haymakers. Damage is increased if you mutate Lithodermis.
Claws (Chud) 2 2 0 1 Slash 1-8 2% Chuds have their fists replaced with this. If you are hit, they can give you any diseases the chud has.
Claws (Zombie) 2 2 0 Slash 1-8 Zombies have their fists replaced with this. Scales well with brawn, but slow as hell. Has a chance of inflicting zombie rot on hitting.
Claw (Ripper) 2 3 0 Slash

Fish

To be a fisherman you need the cool to keep your line taut when you jerk your pole and the endurance to not get tired of being in one place for a while.
